railway.network

Class Network

  • java.lang.Object
    • railway.network.Network

  • public class Network
extends java.lang.Object

    Stores information about a railway network such as lists of all the Blocks and associated Routes.

      • getFirst

        public Block getFirst()

        Get the first block in the list.

        Returns:
        The first Section in the Network which is an end point.

      • getBlock

        public Block getBlock(int id)

        Finds a component (or block) with a given ID. If it doesn't exist, returns null.

        Parameters:
        id - ID of the block to find.
        Returns:
        Returns the found block or null.

      • addRoute

        public boolean addRoute(Route newRoute)

        Adds a new Route to the list of Routes in this Network, so long as its ID is unique.

        Parameters:
        newRoute - The Route to be added.
        Returns:
        True if the Route has been added. False if a Route with that ID already exists in this Network.

      • getUpEndpoints

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> getUpEndpoints()

        Used by editor to find any upward end point regardless of type.

        Returns:
        array list of endpoint ids

      • getNextId

        public java.lang.Integer getNextId()

        Returns the next available ID through auto incrementing.

        Returns:
        int of last ID + 1.
